categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Xroi was a group of 2 BFF-1 bulk freighters used by the Rebel Alliance. The two freighters were part of a convoy including 3 CR90 corvettes called Qiluiy in the Mennaalii system which came under attack by pirates aboard the frigate Scorpion. However the pirate attack was driven off by Rebel X-wings, Y-wings, and A-wings.
